Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1983...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1985, off Louis Sacco (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1985, off Marcos Franco (GHG)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1987, hitting .560 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Wisconsin on 7/25/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/9/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $843,600 per year...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Bay City on 7/30/1991 (Going to BC: 1B L. Pascale. Going to SHP: P K. Barrot, 1B E. Batey)...
Released by Bay City on 6/2/1992...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/11/1993 to a 5-year deal worth $1,588,500 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1993, hitting .667 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
